name: Hippocampus TR-303
desc: After an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 10%. If it is an Elite Enemy, then Charges 40%.
enhanced_desc: When entering battle, charges "Brain in a Vat" by 100%. After an ally target Breaks an enemy target's Weakness, Charges "Brain in a Vat" by 12%. If it is an Elite Enemy, then Charges 50%.
